[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ custom_padding=”54px|0px|54px|0|false|false”][et_pb_row use_custom_width=”on” use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ custom_padding=”||70px||false|false” module_class=”centered-content” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”A unique combination of factors makes Siberia a great place for mining.” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ text_orientation=”center”]

What does it cost to host?

 

Our facilities give you the chance to host miners with the same advantages as professional mining investors, even when you use only one or two machines.

We’ve rolled all your expenses into a simple fee, based on the consumption of a certain model.

From 0.068€ per kWh all-in

There are no other costs to pay, and initial and the monthly fee is not a subject to VAT.

Your hosting fee is calculated daily based on factually delivered hash rate to the pool and is automatically deducted from your balance. In rare case if the miner has delivered less than the nominal hash rate of the model, the hosting cost is proportionally lowered.

For example:
Antminer S19Pro-110TH/s consumes 3412kW
In 24h it consumes 24 * 3.412 = 81.89kWh while producing 110TH.
This means daily hosting fee would comprise 81.89kWh*0.068€/kWh = 5.56€

Average monthly fee for this model is calculated this way: 730 * 3.412 * 0.068 = 169.37€

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.13.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_end=”#35a0ff”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_cta title=”Welcome-bonus 25€” button_text=”Click Here” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ use_background_color=”off”] Check out our features and available miners for yourself right on the platform. Look into the marketplace for other users’ offers. Check out pre-orders for next batches. Test it all with a smallest unit – 10% piece of a shared S19Pro. Sign up now. No strings attached. [/et_pb_cta][et_pb_button button_url=”https://my.cyberianmine.de/users/sign_up” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Sign Up and get 25€ for hosting!” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.13.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset3″ background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” /][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”100px||50px|” module_class=”quote-block” _builder_version=”3.13.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote title” _builder_version=”3.13.1″]

Thinking big?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Quote content” module_class=”large” _builder_version=”3.13.1″] We have 12MW capacity, extending to 24MW in the next 12 months. If you’re planning to send 100+ machines, get in touch for a discount. [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
